treat empirically for GPC joint infection with vancomycin (HD

addition, he was still complaining of pain with passive motion

was placed on telemetry for monitoring, with no significant 
events. Because of recent TTE, a repeat was not obtained. 
Orthostatic vitals did not show evidence of orthostatic

resolved by the next day without intervention. No offending
